name: 1-877-MATH-FOR-KIDSBeginningAddition
0:
”Alexa, open Beginning Addition!”
”Alexa, start Beginning Addition!”
”Alexa, launch Beginning Addition!”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: beginning addition
des:
Are you struggling with basic addition? Well, struggle no more! 1-877-MATH-FOR-KIDS: Beginning Addition is here to save the day! You and your little friends can practice adding one and two digit numbers in this multiplayer game!

This skill is intended for use with Echo Buttons! However, in the very small chance in which you are currently lacking Echo Buttons, you should go order some right now! Or, you can tell Alexa that you are playing a one player game - the one player game does not require a set of Echo Buttons!

Wow, math is fun!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
